item.title: Report X-2025030114
item.description:
Report X-2025030114

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T18:18:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-26
  • City: NEW STANTON
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: CALLED TO UNLOAD SECTION FOUR FOR A LEAKING HAZMAT. ON ARRIVAL RESPONDER FOUND ONE BOX WITH A LARGE STAIN ON IT. ON FURTHER INSPECTION FOUND THAT ONE OF THE CANS HAD A SMALL LEAK CAUSED BY A DENT IN THE CAN. THERE WAS NO CUSHIONING BETWEEN THE CANS
